source: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_SEQ_00<tab>Maurelin, a Serpent at the Bannock, is seeking a volunteer to gather materials used in the training of recruits.
target: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_SEQ_00<tab>バノック練兵所のモルランは新兵の訓練に必要な資材集めを手伝ってくれる者を探している。

source: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_SEQ_01<tab>Collect four shells from the giant, insect-like bog yarzons that dwell in the river to the south of the Bannock.
target: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_SEQ_01<tab>新兵の教練のために、バノック練兵所の南の川に生息する「ボッグヤーゾン」から、「ボッグヤーゾンの甲殻」を4つ入手しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_SEQ_02<tab>You have collected the bog yarzon shells. Deliver them to Mariustel at the Bannock.
target: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_SEQ_02<tab>ボッグヤーゾンの甲殻を集め終えた。「バノック練兵所」の「マリウステル」に届けよう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_SEQ_03<tab>Mariustel intends to use the shells you have brought him in the next round of training drills. Once the recruits have learned how best to dispatch a bog yarzon, maintaining a secure perimeter around the camp will seem a far less daunting task.
target: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_SEQ_03<tab>冒険者の入手したボッグヤーゾンの甲殻を使って早速、稽古にとりかかるというマリウステル。新兵が腕を上げれば、練兵所周辺の警備も楽になるだろう。

source: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_TODO_00<tab>Slay bog yarzons and obtain their shells.
target: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_TODO_00<tab>ボッグヤーゾンからボッグヤーゾンの甲殻を入手

source: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the bog yarzon shells to Mariustel at the Bannock.
target: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_TODO_01<tab>マリウステルにボッグヤーゾンの甲殻を渡す

source: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MAURELIN_000_1<tab>Ho there, adventurer. If it is work you seek, then look no further.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MAURELIN_000_1おいお前、仕事を探しているなら、
俺の依頼をうけないか？

source: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MAURELIN_000_2<tab>Instructor Mariustel needs a volunteer to bring him some bog yarzon shells for the recruits to practice on.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MAURELIN_000_2マリウステル教官が、新兵の教育のために
「ボッグヤーゾンの甲殻」を使いたいそうだ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MAURELIN_000_3<tab>You'll find yarzons in the river south of here. Once you've pried the carapaces from four of the creatures, take them to the instructor.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MAURELIN_000_3この近くの川に棲んでいる「ボッグヤーゾン」から
「ボッグヤーゾンの甲殻」を4つ、手に入れてほしい。
集めたらマリウステル教官に渡してくれ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MARIUSTEL_000_11<tab>Hm? Not a new recruit? Then wh─ Ah, the yarzon shells I ordered Maurelin to requisition! I see he's learned to delegate authority if nothing else.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MARIUSTEL_000_11モルランに頼んでいた「ボッグヤーゾンの甲殻」か！
よし、これで訓練が捗るな。

source: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MARIUSTEL_000_12<tab>Now that I have these carapaces, I can set my recruits some specialized drills. They are already adept at hitting a target, of course, but they need practical knowledge of exactly <var 1A 02 /var>where<var 1A 01 /var> a monster like the yarzon is most vulnerable.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MARIUSTEL_000_12新兵どもは、的を狙うのは得意でも
実際の戦闘で魔物のどこを狙えばいいかを知らん。
この甲殻を使ってボッグヤーゾンの急所を教えこむつもりだ。

source: TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MARIUSTEL_000_13<tab>Thanks to your efforts, I've no doubt they will fare rather better against the creatures when called upon. You should be proud of yourself─both they and the Bannock are safer for your help.
target:
TEXT_SUBFST041_00197_MARIUSTEL_000_13これは、新兵どもの成長に一役買ってくれた礼だ。
受け取ってくれ。
